title: Ep. - 305 - THERESA CAPUTO FROM LONG ISLAND MEDIUM CARMEL: WHO KILLED MARIA MARTA
description:
Kate talks about her fascination with the Netflix docuseries Carmel: Who Killed Maria Marta, which tells the story of a sociologist killed in 2002 and still the killer is yet to be found. The case became one of most controversial criminal cases in Argentinian history.

 

Theresa Caputo, star of TLC’s The Long Island Medium and Host of Hey Spirit podcast gives Kate messages from her loved ones who have passed and what it is really like to channel spirit.


 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
